des: "Great on my Aussie Beefcake Burgers, on a sandwich with cold meat and salad, or for dipping fried chicken and chips in."
ins: Place egg yolks, garlic, 1 teaspoon vinegar, mustard powder, salt, and white pepper in the bowl of a food processor. Cover and turn processor on; pour in canola oil in very slowly at first, then more quickly as mixture thickens. Blend in remaining 1 teaspoon vinegar.
